thread.title: 3 shot at Richton Park bowling alley
thread.title_full: 3 shot at Richton Park bowling alley

author: Sun-Times Wire
title: 3 shot at Richton Park bowling alley
text:
3 shot at Richton Park bowling alley 
Sun-Times file photo Sun-Times Wire Sign-Up for our News & Politics Newsletter Sign-Up 
Three people are in custody after three people were shot early Sunday at a bowling alley in south suburban Richton Park. 
Officers responded about 1:30 a.m. to a call of shots fired at Lakewood Bowl, 5125 Sauk Trail, where they found two people suffering from gunshot wounds, according to a statement from Richton Park police. 
A third victim drove himself to the hospital, police said. All three people are being treated for gunshot wounds, but additional details were not provided. 
Three people were in custody Sunday morning and the investigation is ongoing, police said. 
Anyone with information on the shooting is asked to contact the Detective Division at (708) 283-6393 ext. 427. Previously from Chicago News
